about-face.options.enable-rotation.name: Enable About Face Rotation
about-face.options.enable-rotation.hint: Rotates tokens when moving them (except when locked). If disabled, can still hold shift to rotate in place
about-face.options.enable-indicator.name: Enable token indicators
about-face.options.enable-indicator.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to tokens
about-face.options.flip-or-rotate.name: Flip or Rotate the token
about-face.options.flip-or-rotate.hint: Instead of rotating the token, flip it
